channel.title: The Compass Rose Band
channel.description: Recent content on The Compass Rose Band

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to the internet home of The Compass Rose Band, based out of Cedar Rapids, IA. We are a Classic / Southern rock band that plays high energy music from artists such as the Eagles, Beatles, Zac Brown, Styx, Lynyrd Skynyrd, Merle Haggard, Vince Gill, Waylon Jennings, etc. Go to our Facebook page and “Like” it to get updates via your Facebook account or follow us on the Bandsintown app. You can view a video of one of our performances here.

item.title: Songs We Play
item.description: We play songs from artists such as: America, Beach Boys, The Beatles, Billy Currington, Billy Joel, Boston, Brooks and Dunn, Bryan Adams, The Cars, Charlie Daniels, Crosby, Stills & Nash, Cross Canadian Ragweed, Dwight Yoakam, The Eagles, Eddie Mone Garth Brooks, Georgia Satellites, Huey Lewis, J.J. Cale, Jim Croce, Jimmy Buffett, John Mellencamp, Johnny Cash, Kenny Chesney, Kentucky Headhunters, Loggins and Messina, Lynyrd Skynyrd, Merle Haggard, Paul Simon, Pure Prairie League, Roy Orbison, Sam the Sham, Smokie, Stray Cats, Styx, Surfaris, Three Dog Night, Van Morrison Zac Brown, Vince Gill, and Waylon Jennings & Willie Nelson

item.title: About the Band
item.description: Doug Rassler - Lead Vocals Danny Roberts - Lead Guitar & Vocals Mark Lauterwasser - Keyboards & Vocals Ron Johnson - Drums
